page.title: 01Overview Of Wadborough Area.
page.content: Our area is mainly farm land. There are two big woods and about five copses. There are thirteen farms in our area. The majorty of the farms are Arable but a few of these keep sheep. The road A44 runs through the corner of our area it leads on to the M5. The main Worcester to Gloucester railway runs through Wadborough. The population of Wadborough is two hundred and seven. Wadborough is a bigger village than Pirton but we only have half of Pirton in our area. There are lots of minor roads leading to out lining towns and villages. Such as Worcester and Pershore. Caldwell is a big estate, the ground coverage is about 4\ hectares. Caldwell is a residential bed and breakfast house.
